hoe noun [C]
(INSULT)
offensive slang another spelling of
ho
to remove weeds and break up the surface of the ground, using a garden tool with a long handle and a short blade: They spent the afternoon hoeing the vegetable patch. Keep hoeing between rows of plants to subdue weeds.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was hoeing the cotton field to remove weeds.She had a hard morning's work, hand weeding and hoeing.I hoed the ground where I wanted to plant sunflowers.
